text: Tarik Dam is a dam on the Sefīd-Rūd river in the Alborz mountain range, about south of Rasht in Gilan Province, northern Iran. It is located downstream of the Sefidrud Dam. The dam was completed in 1977 to distribute releases from the Sefidrud Dam for irrigation and river regulation purposes. A hydroelectric power station, with an installed capacity of 2.8 MW, was under construction in 2013 as part of the dam's structure. ==See also== * * List of power stations in Iran * ==References== Category:Dams in Iran Category:Hydroelectric power stations in Iran Category:Alborz (mountain range) Category:Buildings and structures in Gilan Province Category:Dams completed in 1977 Category:Energy infrastructure completed in 2016 Category:1977 establishments in Iran
title: Tarik Dam
